  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GetEmails.Callback  
    GetLocation.LocationCallback
    Interface to be implemented by the calling class if it wants to receive the result returns current location of the device if available null if not available

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Culture
    Set of functions handling the localized content, such as the display of numbers and dates.
    GetEmails  
    GetLocation
    Class to call the location Services to get current location of the device Set android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your Manifest

    IActivity
    Methods common to all Activities and that can be reused
